plot: Short film about the life of yoghurt-cups and other products in a refrigerator, trying to survive long enough to be consumed.
title: Yaourts mystiques
plot_es: Short film about the life of yoghurt-cups and other products in a refrigerator, trying to survive long enough to be consumed.
plot_en: Short film about the life of yoghurt-cups and other products in a refrigerator, trying to survive long enough to be consumed.
